00056 class btTetrahedronShapeEx:public btBU_Simplex1to4
00057 {
00058 public:
00059         btTetrahedronShapeEx()
00060         {
00061                 m_numVertices = 4;
00062         }
00063 
00064 
00065         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setVertices(
00066                 const btVector3 & v0,const btVector3 & v1,
00067                 const btVector3 & v2,const btVector3 & v3)
00068         {
00069                 m_vertices[0] = v0;
00070                 m_vertices[1] = v1;
00071                 m_vertices[2] = v2;
00072                 m_vertices[3] = v3;
00073                 recalcLocalAabb();
00074         }
00075 };

00079 class btGImpactShapeInterface : public btConcaveShape
00080 {
00081 protected:
00082     btAABB m_localAABB;
00083     bool m_needs_update;
00084     btVector3  localScaling;
00085     btGImpactBoxSet m_box_set;// optionally boxset
00086 
00089     virtual void calcLocalAABB()
00090     {
00091                 lockChildShapes();
00092         if(m_box_set.getNodeCount() == 0)
00093         {
00094                 m_box_set.buildSet();
00095         }
00096         else
00097         {
00098                 m_box_set.update();
00099         }
00100         unlockChildShapes();
00101 
00102         m_localAABB = m_box_set.getGlobalBox();
00103     }
00104 
00105 
00106 public:
00107         btGImpactShapeInterface()
00108         {
00109                 m_shapeType=GIMPACT_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE;
00110                 m_localAABB.invalidate();
00111                 m_needs_update = true;
00112                 localScaling.setValue(1.f,1.f,1.f);
00113         }
00114 
00115 
00117 
00123     SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void updateBound()
00124     {
00125         if(!m_needs_update) return;
00126         calcLocalAABB();
00127         m_needs_update  = false;
00128     }
00129 
00131 
00134     void getAabb(const btTransform& t,btVector3& aabbMin,btVector3& aabbMax) const
00135     {
00136         btAABB transformedbox = m_localAABB;
00137         transformedbox.appy_transform(t);
00138         aabbMin = transformedbox.m_min;
00139         aabbMax = transformedbox.m_max;
00140     }
00141 
00143     virtual void postUpdate()
00144     {
00145         m_needs_update = true;
00146     }
00147 
00149         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE const btAABB & getLocalBox()
00150         {
00151                 return m_localAABB;
00152         }
00153 
00154 
00155     virtual int getShapeType() const
00156     {
00157         return GIMPACT_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE;
00158     }
00159 
00163         virtual void    setLocalScaling(const btVector3& scaling)
00164         {
00165                 localScaling = scaling;
00166                 postUpdate();
00167         }
00168 
00169         virtual const btVector3& getLocalScaling() const
00170         {
00171                 return localScaling;
00172         }
00173 
00174 
00175         virtual void setMargin(btScalar margin)
00176     {
00177         m_collisionMargin = margin;
00178         int i = getNumChildShapes();
00179         while(i--)
00180         {
00181                         btCollisionShape* child = getChildShape(i);
00182                         child->setMargin(margin);
00183         }
00184 
00185                 m_needs_update = true;
00186     }
00187 
00188 
00191 
00193         virtual eGIMPACT_SHAPE_TYPE getGImpactShapeType() const = 0 ;
00194 
00196         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE const btGImpactBoxSet * getBoxSet() const
00197         {
00198                 return &m_box_set;
00199         }
00200 
00202         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool hasBoxSet()  const
00203         {
00204                 if(m_box_set.getNodeCount() == 0) return false;
00205                 return true;
00206         }

00250     {
00251         btAABB child_aabb;
00252         getPrimitiveManager()->get_primitive_box(child_index,child_aabb);
00253         child_aabb.appy_transform(t);
00254         aabbMin = child_aabb.m_min;
00255         aabbMax = child_aabb.m_max;
00256     }

00310 class btGImpactCompoundShape    : public btGImpactShapeInterface
00311 {
00312 public:
00314         class CompoundPrimitiveManager:public btPrimitiveManagerBase
00315         {
00316         public:
00317                 virtual ~CompoundPrimitiveManager() {}
00318                 btGImpactCompoundShape * m_compoundShape;
00319 
00320 
00321                 CompoundPrimitiveManager(const CompoundPrimitiveManager& compound)
00322             : btPrimitiveManagerBase()
00323                 {
00324                         m_compoundShape = compound.m_compoundShape;
00325                 }
00326 
00327                 CompoundPrimitiveManager(btGImpactCompoundShape * compoundShape)
00328                 {
00329                         m_compoundShape = compoundShape;
00330                 }
00331 
00332                 CompoundPrimitiveManager()
00333                 {
00334                         m_compoundShape = NULL;
00335                 }
00336 
00337                 virtual bool is_trimesh() const
00338                 {
00339                         return false;
00340                 }
00341 
00342                 virtual int get_primitive_count() const
00343                 {
00344                         return (int )m_compoundShape->getNumChildShapes();
00345                 }
00346 
00347                 virtual void get_primitive_box(int prim_index ,btAABB & primbox) const
00348                 {
00349                         btTransform prim_trans;
00350                         if(m_compoundShape->childrenHasTransform())
00351                         {
00352                                 prim_trans = m_compoundShape->getChildTransform(prim_index);
00353                         }
00354                         else
00355                         {
00356                                 prim_trans.setIdentity();
00357                         }
00358                         const btCollisionShape* shape = m_compoundShape->getChildShape(prim_index);
00359                         shape->getAabb(prim_trans,primbox.m_min,primbox.m_max);
00360                 }
00361 
00362                 virtual void get_primitive_triangle(int prim_index,btPrimitiveTriangle & triangle) const
00363                 {
00364                         btAssert(0);
00365             (void) prim_index; (void) triangle;
00366                 }
00367 
00368         };

00396                 return true;
00397         }

00414         {
00415                 return m_childShapes.size();
00416         }

00418 
00420         void addChildShape(const btTransform& localTransform,btCollisionShape* shape)
00421         {
00422                 btAssert(shape->isConvex());
00423                 m_childTransforms.push_back(localTransform);
00424                 m_childShapes.push_back(shape);
00425         }
00426 
00428         void addChildShape(btCollisionShape* shape)
00429         {
00430                 btAssert(shape->isConvex());
00431                 m_childShapes.push_back(shape);
00432         }
00433 
00435         virtual btCollisionShape* getChildShape(int index)
00436         {
00437                 return m_childShapes[index];
00438         }

00444         }

00447 
00449     virtual void getChildAabb(int child_index,const btTransform& t,btVector3& aabbMin,btVector3& aabbMax) const
00450     {
00451 
00452         if(childrenHasTransform())
00453         {
00454                 m_childShapes[child_index]->getAabb(t*m_childTransforms[child_index],aabbMin,aabbMax);
00455         }
00456         else
00457         {
00458                 m_childShapes[child_index]->getAabb(t,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00459         }
00460     }
00461 
00462 
00464         virtual btTransform     getChildTransform(int index) const
00465         {
00466                 btAssert(m_childTransforms.size() == m_childShapes.size());
00467                 return m_childTransforms[index];
00468         }
00469 
00471 
00474         virtual void setChildTransform(int index, const btTransform & transform)
00475         {
00476                 btAssert(m_childTransforms.size() == m_childShapes.size());
00477                 m_childTransforms[index] = transform;
00478                 postUpdate();
00479         }

00531 class btGImpactMeshShapePart : public btGImpactShapeInterface
00532 {
00533 public:
00535 
00538         class TrimeshPrimitiveManager:public btPrimitiveManagerBase
00539         {
00540         public:
00541                 btScalar m_margin;
00542                 btStridingMeshInterface * m_meshInterface;
00543                 btVector3 m_scale;
00544                 int m_part;
00545                 int m_lock_count;
00546                 const unsigned char *vertexbase;
00547                 int numverts;
00548                 PHY_ScalarType type;
00549                 int stride;
00550                 const unsigned char *indexbase;
00551                 int indexstride;
00552                 int  numfaces;
00553                 PHY_ScalarType indicestype;
00554 
00555                 TrimeshPrimitiveManager()
00556                 {
00557                         m_meshInterface = NULL;
00558                         m_part = 0;
00559                         m_margin = 0.01f;
00560                         m_scale = btVector3(1.f,1.f,1.f);
00561                         m_lock_count = 0;
00562                         vertexbase = 0;
00563                         numverts = 0;
00564                         stride = 0;
00565                         indexbase = 0;
00566                         indexstride = 0;
00567                         numfaces = 0;
00568                 }
00569 
00570                 TrimeshPrimitiveManager(const TrimeshPrimitiveManager & manager)
00571             : btPrimitiveManagerBase()
00572                 {
00573                         m_meshInterface = manager.m_meshInterface;
00574                         m_part = manager.m_part;
00575                         m_margin = manager.m_margin;
00576                         m_scale = manager.m_scale;
00577                         m_lock_count = 0;
00578                         vertexbase = 0;
00579                         numverts = 0;
00580                         stride = 0;
00581                         indexbase = 0;
00582                         indexstride = 0;
00583                         numfaces = 0;
00584 
00585                 }
00586 
00587                 TrimeshPrimitiveManager(
00588                         btStridingMeshInterface * meshInterface,        int part)
00589                 {
00590                         m_meshInterface = meshInterface;
00591                         m_part = part;
00592                         m_scale = m_meshInterface->getScaling();
00593                         m_margin = 0.1f;
00594                         m_lock_count = 0;
00595                         vertexbase = 0;
00596                         numverts = 0;
00597                         stride = 0;
00598                         indexbase = 0;
00599                         indexstride = 0;
00600                         numfaces = 0;
00601 
00602                 }
00603 
00604                 virtual ~TrimeshPrimitiveManager() {}
00605 
00606                 void lock()
00607                 {
00608                         if(m_lock_count>0)
00609                         {
00610                                 m_lock_count++;
00611                                 return;
00612                         }
00613                         m_meshInterface->getLockedReadOnlyVertexIndexBase(
00614                                 &vertexbase,numverts,
00615                                 type, stride,&indexbase, indexstride, numfaces,indicestype,m_part);
00616 
00617                         m_lock_count = 1;
00618                 }
00619 
00620                 void unlock()
00621                 {
00622                         if(m_lock_count == 0) return;
00623                         if(m_lock_count>1)
00624                         {
00625                                 --m_lock_count;
00626                                 return;
00627                         }
00628                         m_meshInterface->unLockReadOnlyVertexBase(m_part);
00629                         vertexbase = NULL;
00630                         m_lock_count = 0;
00631                 }
00632 
00633                 virtual bool is_trimesh() const
00634                 {
00635                         return true;
00636                 }
00637 
00638                 virtual int get_primitive_count() const
00639                 {
00640                         return (int )numfaces;
00641                 }
00642 
00643                 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int get_vertex_count() const
00644                 {
00645                         return (int )numverts;
00646                 }
00647 
00648                 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void get_indices(int face_index,unsigned int &i0,unsigned int &i1,unsigned int &i2) const
00649                 {
00650                         if(indicestype == PHY_SHORT)
00651                         {
00652                                 unsigned short* s_indices = (unsigned short *)(indexbase + face_index * indexstride);
00653                                 i0 = s_indices[0];
00654                                 i1 = s_indices[1];
00655                                 i2 = s_indices[2];
00656                         }
00657                         else
00658                         {
00659                                 unsigned int * i_indices = (unsigned int *)(indexbase + face_index*indexstride);
00660                                 i0 = i_indices[0];
00661                                 i1 = i_indices[1];
00662                                 i2 = i_indices[2];
00663                         }
00664                 }
00665 
00666                 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void get_vertex(unsigned int vertex_index, btVector3 & vertex) const
00667                 {
00668                         if(type == PHY_DOUBLE)
00669                         {
00670                                 double * dvertices = (double *)(vertexbase + vertex_index*stride);
00671                                 vertex[0] = btScalar(dvertices[0]*m_scale[0]);
00672                                 vertex[1] = btScalar(dvertices[1]*m_scale[1]);
00673                                 vertex[2] = btScalar(dvertices[2]*m_scale[2]);
00674                         }
00675                         else
00676                         {
00677                                 float * svertices = (float *)(vertexbase + vertex_index*stride);
00678                                 vertex[0] = svertices[0]*m_scale[0];
00679                                 vertex[1] = svertices[1]*m_scale[1];
00680                                 vertex[2] = svertices[2]*m_scale[2];
00681                         }
00682                 }
00683 
00684                 virtual void get_primitive_box(int prim_index ,btAABB & primbox) const
00685                 {
00686                         btPrimitiveTriangle  triangle;
00687                         get_primitive_triangle(prim_index,triangle);
00688                         primbox.calc_from_triangle_margin(
00689                                 triangle.m_vertices[0],
00690                                 triangle.m_vertices[1],triangle.m_vertices[2],triangle.m_margin);
00691                 }
00692 
00693                 virtual void get_primitive_triangle(int prim_index,btPrimitiveTriangle & triangle) const
00694                 {
00695                         unsigned int indices[3];
00696                         get_indices(prim_index,indices[0],indices[1],indices[2]);
00697                         get_vertex(indices[0],triangle.m_vertices[0]);
00698                         get_vertex(indices[1],triangle.m_vertices[1]);
00699                         get_vertex(indices[2],triangle.m_vertices[2]);
00700                         triangle.m_margin = m_margin;
00701                 }
00702 
00703                 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void get_bullet_triangle(int prim_index,btTriangleShapeEx & triangle) const
00704                 {
00705                         unsigned int indices[3];
00706                         get_indices(prim_index,indices[0],indices[1],indices[2]);
00707                         get_vertex(indices[0],triangle.m_vertices1[0]);
00708                         get_vertex(indices[1],triangle.m_vertices1[1]);
00709                         get_vertex(indices[2],triangle.m_vertices1[2]);
00710                         triangle.setMargin(m_margin);
00711                 }
00712 
00713         };

00883 
00890 class btGImpactMeshShape : public btGImpactShapeInterface
00891 {
00892         btStridingMeshInterface* m_meshInterface;
00893 
00894 protected:
00895         btAlignedObjectArray<btGImpactMeshShapePart*> m_mesh_parts;
00896         void buildMeshParts(btStridingMeshInterface * meshInterface)
00897         {
00898                 for (int i=0;i<meshInterface->getNumSubParts() ;++i )
00899                 {
00900                         btGImpactMeshShapePart * newpart = new btGImpactMeshShapePart(meshInterface,i);
00901                         m_mesh_parts.push_back(newpart);
00902                 }
00903         }
00904 
00906     virtual void calcLocalAABB()
00907     {
00908         m_localAABB.invalidate();
00909         int i = m_mesh_parts.size();
00910         while(i--)
00911         {
00912                 m_mesh_parts[i]->updateBound();
00913                 m_localAABB.merge(m_mesh_parts[i]->getLocalBox());
00914         }
00915     }
00916 
00917 public:
00918         btGImpactMeshShape(btStridingMeshInterface * meshInterface)
00919         {
00920                 m_meshInterface = meshInterface;
00921                 buildMeshParts(meshInterface);
00922         }
00923 
00924         virtual ~btGImpactMeshShape()
00925         {
00926                 int i = m_mesh_parts.size();
00927         while(i--)
00928         {
00929                         btGImpactMeshShapePart * part = m_mesh_parts[i];
00930                         delete part;
00931         }
00932                 m_mesh_parts.clear();
00933         }
00934 
00935 
00936         btStridingMeshInterface* getMeshInterface()
00937         {
00938                 return m_meshInterface;
00939         }
00940 
00941         const btStridingMeshInterface* getMeshInterface() const
00942         {
00943                 return m_meshInterface;
00944         }
00945 
00946         int getMeshPartCount() const
00947         {
00948                 return m_mesh_parts.size();
00949         }
00950 
00951         btGImpactMeshShapePart * getMeshPart(int index)
00952         {
00953                 return m_mesh_parts[index];
00954         }
00955 
00956 
00957 
00958         const btGImpactMeshShapePart * getMeshPart(int index) const
00959         {
00960                 return m_mesh_parts[index];
00961         }
00962 
00963 
00964         virtual void    setLocalScaling(const btVector3& scaling)
00965         {
00966                 localScaling = scaling;
00967 
00968                 int i = m_mesh_parts.size();
00969         while(i--)
00970         {
00971                         btGImpactMeshShapePart * part = m_mesh_parts[i];
00972                         part->setLocalScaling(scaling);
00973         }
00974 
00975                 m_needs_update = true;
00976         }
00977 
00978         virtual void setMargin(btScalar margin)
00979     {
00980         m_collisionMargin = margin;
00981 
00982                 int i = m_mesh_parts.size();
00983         while(i--)
00984         {
00985                         btGImpactMeshShapePart * part = m_mesh_parts[i];
00986                         part->setMargin(margin);
00987         }
00988 
00989                 m_needs_update = true;
00990     }
00991 
00993     virtual void postUpdate()
00994     {
00995                 int i = m_mesh_parts.size();
00996         while(i--)
00997         {
00998                         btGImpactMeshShapePart * part = m_mesh_parts[i];
00999                         part->postUpdate();
01000         }
01001 
01002         m_needs_update = true;
01003     }
01004
